column4: Hey everyone, Is there anyway to force or set a "default" microphone upon it being plugged in. Upon plugging in a USB mic its the second choice and I have to switch to it every time its plugged in.
I've even checked the forums and posted on them but no solution, There's no way to set a USB mic to default on it being plugged in?
I don't know, but it might be a good feature to request.
hmm, yeah, I've no idea either.  Used to be that you filed a bug with the title or tag as [feature request]    but Im not sure anymore..  Maybe there were just too many!
